definition: starting point or ending point (in stories etc)/end point (math)
end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: The "mex" endpoint allows other applications to discover the capabilities of the service.
sentences.chinese: 在“墨西哥”端點允許其他應用程序發現服務的能力。

sentences.english: The number of gateways and endpoints has little effect.
sentences.chinese: 網關和端點的數量幾乎沒有任何影響。

sentences.english: Recoverable errors -- The request must be submitted to another endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 請求必須提交給另一個端點。

sentences.english: An implementation can improve this situation through externalizing the endpoint addresses into configuration files .NET.
sentences.chinese: 將端點地址放到配置文件中可以改善這種情況。

sentences.english: For our tutorial, we only have one endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 對於本教程，我們僅有一個端點。

sentences.english: Client with high priority will be routed to the second service endpoint.
sentences.chinese: 具有高優先權的客戶將被路由到第二個服務端點。

sentences.english: You might also choose to externalize the routing using an endpoint lookup primitive.
sentences.chinese: 您還可能通過一個端點查找原語來具體化路由。

sentences.english: This specification includes static information about the various service endpoints to be used.
sentences.chinese: 這包括指定有關要使用的各個服務端點的靜態信息。

sentences.english: It allows organization to virtualize and centrally control services endpoint addresses.
sentences.chinese: 允許組織對服務端點地址進行虛擬化和集中控制。

sentences.english: This endpoint is appended to the binding handle of the given interface and returned to the caller.
sentences.chinese: 把這個端點附加到接口的綁定句柄中並返回給調用者。

sentences.english: Administrators can change endpoint addresses in the administration console.
sentences.chinese: 管理員可以在管理控制檯更改端點地址。

sentences.english: Endpoints can be added to groups or removed from them.
sentences.chinese: 端點能夠添加到組，或從組中刪除端點。

sentences.english: Endpoints can be added to groups or removed from them.
sentences.chinese: 端點能夠添加到組，或從組中刪除端點。

sentences.english: You are then using the endpoints as defined in the remote configuration file.
sentences.chinese: 那時，您使用的是遠程配置文件中定義的端點。

definition: Kenting National Park on the Hengchun Peninsula 恆春半島|恒春半岛[Heng2 chun1 Ban4 dao3], Pingtung county, south Taiwan
pinyin: Ken3 ding1 Guo2 jia1 Gong1 yuan2

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
Tokyo Bay/former name of 北部灣|北部湾[Bei3 bu4 Wan1], Gulf of Tonkin
